comment: Hi Experts , Well reached this site as an avenue for help . My Iphone 6 from Maxis had blue screen of Death a couple of times. but since i was overseas , i could really repair it as its not an international warranty. - The blue Screen of death unable to boot up and load  will be around for few days and suddently thn ok.. Anyone knows how to recover this problems.. Also if i need to do a factory reset any idea to get the data especially photos and contacts ? Cheers and thanks alot for your help
topic_title: My Iphone 6 Blue Screen of Death , Need to Recover

comment: did you change lcd before? some ppl have used wrong screw and that will cause bsod
topic_title: My Iphone 6 Blue Screen of Death , Need to Recover

comment: No I didnt ... Thanks btw ..
topic_title: My Iphone 6 Blue Screen of Death , Need to Recover

comment: I experience this and temporary solution is to let the blue screen run then try to clear install (dfu mode) the ios. Also when you do your backup, dont direct restore as when you try to restore back, the bluescreen will come back. Please restore after you see the bdso is gone As your device still under warranty, you need to send it back (they will give you new replacement set)
topic_title: My Iphone 6 Blue Screen of Death , Need to Recover

comment: Thanks .. would like o check how long did the blue screen run for mine is almost for 2 weeks already ..
topic_title: My Iphone 6 Blue Screen of Death , Need to Recover
